channel.title: 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars - Romeo Sector (Mondays in November)
channel.description:
***For the first 48 hours (until 5th September at 1pm) please only sign up to this game if you have already played in a previous game of 3:16 with me on The Gauntlet.***
“Tired Of Life? Join The Expeditionary Force And See The Cosmos.” — Recruitment Advert
![Vrakk-300x218|300x218](upload://xbnxgKRSq4X1KcNzjxKjf85Twk8.jpeg)
The elite 3:16th Expeditionary Force left Terra many years ago with an explicit mission: Alien civilizations, intelligences and life of any kind are to be wiped out to protect the future safety of the people home on Terra.
**Content Warning:** Militarism, Genocide
These session are scheduled for 3.5 hours, and will be recorded.
This is for four sessions of 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars. Being able to attend each session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This is a continuation of previous sectors played and if you played in those you are welcome to return to duty with your Trooper. But if you didn’t fresh meat is always welcome on the front lines!
We will be using Zoom as the platform. Participants must be able to access Roll20 tools for the game.
The X-card will be in use. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our [Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) on the website.
RSVPs open to all on 6th September at 1pm.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGI_Htly5iBMj6ZLfwE) [date=2020-11-02 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-11-02 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGI_TSXmn4H7Ub3r-xZ) [date=2020-11-09 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-11-09 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGI_grB4P9sWUgdlsoe) [date=2020-11-16 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-11-16 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGI_qc-G3f5kj8TegJ6) [date=2020-11-23 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-11-23 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]

item.title: 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars - Romeo Sector (Mondays in November)
item.dc:creator: @Anders
item.description:
@Anders wrote:

I wish I could, but I ended up being way too tired the day after to justify playing which makes me sad.

Kill some bugs for me!

Read full topic
item.source: 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars - Romeo Sector (Mondays in November)
